title: Official Fallout Beer you can drink while playing Fallout 4 arrives just in time
text:
Official Fallout Beer you can drink while playing Fallout 4 arrives just in time 
Published By: Pocket-lint.com - Today 
Fallout and beer might be a combination you've tried before, button-bashing away the long gaming hours while staying tipsy-hydrated. But yo...
